thread.title: Strictly curse strikes again as Joanne Clifton 'splits' from boyfriend Joseph Edward-Bader
thread.title_full: Strictly curse strikes again as Joanne Clifton 'splits' from boyfriend Joseph Edward-Bader

author: Vicki Newman
title: Strictly curse strikes again as Joanne Clifton 'splits' from boyfriend Joseph Edward-Bader
text:
Strictly professional Joanne Clifton has reportedly split from her boyfriend Joseph Edward-Bader (Photo: Instagram) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Strictly Come Dancing professional Joanne Clifton has 'split' from her boyfriend Joseph Edward-Bader. 
The couple called it a day just weeks after she lifted the Glitterball trophy with Ore Oduba , according to The Sun. 
The newspaper says that Joanne, 33, and Joseph, 24, the grandson of legendary comic Ronnie Corbett, have ended their relationship. 
They met last June while working together on musical Norma Jeane and reportedly called themselves 'The Two Jos' as a nod to Joseph's granddad's comedy duo, The Two Ronnies. Read More Joanne Clifton 'splits' from Joe Edward-Bader (Photo: Instagram/joeyb8) Joanne triumphed on Strictly with Ore Oduba (Photo: BBC/PA) 
A source told the publication: "The relationship broke down and everyone's in shock. She's taken it really badly. 
"It's a real shame as Jo was really happy - especially after beating her brother Kevin in this year's final." 
Kevin was partnered with runner up Louise Redknapp while Joanne lifted the trophy with sports journalist Ore. 
It is not known why the couple ended their relationship, but it is not believed that anyone else was involved. 
However, there has been a history of break ups as a result of the BBC One show. They met in June while working on a musical (Photo: Instagram/joeyb8) 
So many celebrity contestants fell in love with their professional partners that the Strictly curse was born. 
In 2004, Natasha Kaplinsky and Brendan Cole got together despite them both being in relationships. 
Rachel Riley split with her husband while taking part in the show in 2013 and is now with her dance partner Pasha Kovalev. 
In 2014, Ben Cohen left his wife and is now with his partner Kristina Rihanoff . 
Georgia May Foote had a romance with dancer Giovanni Pernice in 2016 and last series, Daisy Lowe split her her boyfriend Bradley "Frankie" Wade. 
Mirror Celeb has contacted Joanne's representatives for comment. Like us on Facebook
